main.description: Array serialization format identifier for NDArray fields in sample schemas. Known values correspond to token definitions in this Lexicon. Each format has versioned specifications maintained by foundation.ac at canonical URLs.

ndarrayBytes.description: Numpy .npy binary format for NDArray serialization. Stores arrays with dtype and shape in binary header. Versions maintained at https://foundation.ac/schemas/atdata-ndarray-bytes/{version}/
